description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              What we can offer:
              
              Attractive Salary: 700 – 1,200 USD
              
              Yearly KPI - bonus program
              
              International environment based on a high standard Danish university
              
              Nice office environment in District 1. HCMC
              
              Good career opportunities
              

              Developing and implementing marketing and recruitment activities, and coordinating the annual cycle of recruitment events and activities for UCN.
              

              •	Preparation and presentation of specialist information and individualized advice about UCN programmes to prospective students.
              
              •	Building and maintaining relationships with external stakeholders such as student recruitment agents, university partners and high schools.
              
              •	Reporting to the Director on the effectiveness and value of events attended and providing recommendations for future activities in specific markets
              
              •	Analyzing marketing budgets to ensure that expenditure maximises return on investment
              
              •	Working to increase student enrolment to the ATCM and UCN programmes
              
              •	Developing promotional materials including contribution of ideas for brochures, adverts and other materials
              
              •	Responding to complex enquiries from prospective students and their parents and agents knowledgeably and professionally, offering advice on qualifications and programme choices and being able to advise at all stages of the recruitment cycle
              
              •	Advancing the development and implementation of a strategy for online marketing and use of social media
              
              •	Maintaining relationships with agents in relevant markets, including both monitoring performance and providing support and training for their staffs, as required
              
              •	Representing UCN both inside and outside the University and being able to make effective presentations on a range of topics relating to UCN to diverse audiences.
              
              •	Organizing and/or hosting visits to UCMGOV, and overseeing the organization of annual welcome events for students, social events for parents, and visiting agents.
              
              •	Providing assistance, advice and sharing of expertise on UCN and international student recruitment institution-wide
              
              •	Liaising and working effectively with admission department at UCN, and ensuring a collaborative approach to marketing and recruitment activities
              

              Job Categories:
              
              Marketing, PR and Sales
              
              Administrative/Clerical
              
              Education and Recruitment
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              You should be best at: You need to have a background in marketing, student recruitment or international education.
              

              Education: Degree in Marketing, Advertising, Business, Public Relations or equivalent - (Master degree level is preferred)
              

              Min. Years of work experience:	5 years of experience with proven track records, preferable in private or international education industry
              

              Knowledge, Skills & Abilities:
              
              ●	Student recruitment experience, preferably work in international institutions
              
              ●	Experience having worked with cross-functional departments
              
              ●	Ability to multi-task with high sense of initiative
              
              ●	Good communication and interpersonal skills
              
              ●	Ability to do in-depth counseling across business and engineering related disciplines
              
              ●	Self-driven to achieve targets/KPI set
              
              ●	Patient, careful, punctual
              

              Other Requirements:
              
              Independent and dynamic personality
              
              A local with proficiency in written and spoken English
              
              Willing work during weekends when required
              

              NOTE:
              
              Candidate with incomplete application will not be shortlisted and only shortlisted candidate will be contacted. Interested candidates who enjoy working in an international, dynamic environment are invited to send in a detailed resume (stating current and expected salaries) along with a recent photograph.
              

              Preferred Language:
              
              - English
              
              - Vietnamese
              

              Deadline for application: 01 August 2017
              

              Application included : CV, Cover letter và Expect salary
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
